description: This guy was another case of poor judgement. He got threatened by his landlord to pay 8 000 for rent he owed. To solve the problem, the boy went to a loan-shark for a quick loan. Which ended as usual. When I got there, the loan shark wanted 15 000 back and already started to show teeth. This business practice is very common in the Czech Republic. The boy was very lucky I was not interested in his money. I wanted something much more precious to me: his virginity. He wanted to get rid off all his debts so he and his girlfriend could breathe easily. I was one hundred percent sure he didn´t have any gay inclinations, which was why my offer got him really scared. They are always scared, at first. Then they start thinking and I know I will get what I want.
title: Debt Dandy 141
